categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic locations

nodes.text: In the aftermath of the Battle of Endor, General Hera Syndulla had a camp on the planet Endor. Han Solo and Chewbacca were sent to the camp by Leia Organa to speak to Syndulla in order to get ration bars from her, so that they can give them to the Ewoks to prevent them from eating captured stormtroopers.
